document.discussion_title: She Shreds meets Bell Joy Ride
document.topic_text: She Shreds meets Bell Joy Ride By Kierstin Kloeckner I would say I’m in love with most styles/types of bicycle riding. Road riding is the nearest and dearest to my heart, gravel road riding being a close second (if I didn’t have to clean my own bike, this would be number one for me), urban riding on a single speed or Subscribe or log in to read the rest of this content.
